original_title: よっちゃんロシア・残りもの
overview: It's the middle of summer in a cemetery under the blazing sun. In front of a gravestone, the protagonist sends a shout. He keeps shouting "Go, go, go, Akiyama~" until he feels dizzy. What is the reason for this? Is this the grave of the Akiyama family in the first place? ("Remnants")
title: Yotchan Russia/Leftovers
